## Mermaid Flowchart ```mermaid graph LR A-.....-> |text| B ``` ```mermaid flowchart LR A-. text .-> B ``` ```mermaid graph LR classDef q fill:#fff,stroke:#000 A[方形] -->B(圆角) B:::q--> C{条件a} C -->|a=1| D[结果1] C -->|a=2| E[结果2] F[横向流程图] ``` ```mermaid graph TB A[方形] --> B(圆角) B --> C{条件a} C --> |a=1| D[结果1] C --> |a=2| E[结果2] F[竖向流程图] ``` ### Sequence chart ```mermaid sequenceDiagram critical [nkn] Service-->DB: connect option Network timeout Service-->Service: Log error option Credentials rejected Service-->Service: Log different error end ``` ```mermaid sequenceDiagram Consumer-->API: Book something API-->BookingService: Start booking process break when the booking process fails API-->Consumer: show failure end API-->BillingService: Start billing process ```
